The paragraph mentions "amino compounds" and "caproate". Amino compounds are a broad class of organic compounds that contain an amino group (-NH2) and a carboxyl group (-COOH), which are the building blocks of proteins. Caproate is a specific carboxylic acid with the molecular formula CH3(CH2)4COOH.
